title: Rear Suspension Units - Installation

body.body: Before starting work, ensure the motorcycle is stabilised and adequately supported. This will help prevent it from falling and causing injury to the operator or damage to the motorcycle.
Locate the suspension units to the mounting spigots, articulating the swinging arm until the distance between the upper and lower spigots allows the units to fit.
Fit the original washers to the new mounting bolts. Install the bolts and tighten them to
Repeat step 2 for the other rear suspension unit (if removed).
Remove the wheel support (if fitted), lower the motorcycle to the ground and park it on the side stand.
